mapper.delete: delete from cg_button where id in #{item}
delete from cg_button where table_id = #{tableId} AND action = #{action}

#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update cg_button set table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, action = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, append_class = #{appendClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_property = #{actionProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, row_property = #{rowProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_properties = #{displayProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_text = #{confirmText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_refresh_list = #{isRefreshList,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cg_button set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_id = #{record.tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{record.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, action = #{record.action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, append_class = #{record.appendClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_property = #{record.actionProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, row_property = #{record.rowProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_properties = #{record.displayProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_text = #{record.confirmText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_refresh_list = #{record.isRefreshList,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
